sentences.en: A method for preparing dimethyl phosphite was developed from methanol and phosphorous trichloride.
sentences.cn: 研究了用三氯化磷和甲醇合成亚磷酸二甲酯的方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion Urinary calcium and phosphorous is influenced by the constitution of diets.
sentences.cn: 结论不合理的膳食结构是影响尿钙、磷的重要因素之一.

sentences.en: Elimination of phosphorous pentachloride was accomplished utilizing conventional extraction techniques.
sentences.cn: 使用传统的萃取技术除去五氯化磷.

sentences.en: Enviromental friendly. free of Petroleum Distillate, Phosphorous, Plumbum.
sentences.cn: 环保合成, 不含石油馏份,无磷 、 无铅.

sentences.en: Feasibility of preparing activated carbon from bamboo knot with phosphorous acid by microwave radiation was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了以竹节废料为原料,采用微波辐射磷酸法制备活性炭的可行性.

sentences.en: Phosphor - gypsum is the industrial waste discharged from wet process phosphorous acid production.
sentences.cn: 磷石膏为湿法生产磷酸排放的工业废渣,因含可溶磷杂质,不能直接使用.

sentences.en: Principle and operation technology of removing silicon, phosphorous and arsenic from sodium wolframate is presented.
sentences.cn: 阐述了钨酸钠溶液中除硅 、 磷、砷的原理,并提出了具体的操作工艺.

sentences.en: Recognizing that nutrient levels vary in the ocean, they added extra nitrogen and phosphorous to half the tubs in each group.
sentences.cn: 研究人员认识到海洋中的水含营养成分的水平不同，他们在每一组的半数水缸中额外加入氮和磷。

sentences.en: Sows eat their young because they need the phosphorous.
sentences.cn: 大母猪吃仔猪,因为它们缺少磷质.

sentences.en: The inner anode includes insoluble carbon and phosphorous - copper bar.
sentences.cn: 内阳极有两种材质,分别为不溶性碳精棒和含磷铜棒.

sentences.en: The moon glows like phosphorous on the vagrant waters.
sentences.cn: 月亮像磷光在漂浮的水面上发光.

sentences.en: The suggestions for further development of phosphorous chemical industry are put forward.
sentences.cn: 提出了中国磷化工进一步发展的意见.

sentences.en: Then , the best proportion for nitrogen, phosphorous and potassium was 3∶2∶4.
sentences.cn: 最佳氮 、 磷、钾质量比是3∶2∶4.

sentences.en: There is also the alleged use of white phosphorous shells: permitted as a smoke.
sentences.cn: 同样也有传闻说其使用了白色磷弹: 被确认为烟雾.

sentences.en: This dependence may be the result of phosphorous being segregated into the silicon.
sentences.cn: 这种依赖性可能是磷分凝在硅中的结果.

sentences.en: Using ultra - strong phosphorous light , with the collected light of several beams of daylight lamp.
sentences.cn: 采用超强三磷光, 具有多束灯管的光束值.

words.tran_cn: [昆] 发出磷光的；磷光性的

trans.tran_en: of or containing phosphorus in the trivalent state
